## RenameUsingTuples type

Renames keys of an object using renaming tuples. E.g.,

Using this object:

```ts
type O = {
 keyA: A,
 keyB: B,
 keyC: C,
}
```
And this rename map:

```ts
type R = [
 ['keyA', 'renamedA'],
 ['keyB', 'renamedB'],
 ['keyC', 'renamedC'],
]
```
Produce this:

```ts
type Renamed = {
 renamedA: A,
 renamedB: B,
 renamedC: C,
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RenameUsingTuples<T extends Record<string, any>, RenameTuples extends readonly (readonly [string, string])[]> = {
    [K in keyof T as K extends keyof ObjectFromEntries<RenameTuples> ? ObjectFromEntries<RenameTuples>[K] : K]: T[K];
};
```
**References:** [ObjectFromEntries](./data-schema.objectfromentries.md)
